
---
title: '抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - 鸟哥笔记
 - 首页

date: Sat, 18 Jun 2022 01:00:00 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YjgyMTEwYmI3M2ZjODVjYWJhMGY2NGQyYWFjYWI4ZTJfZ1g2S01VSjB4M2p2NTdCS0lYeDdOSFN6Sjh4OGRxem5fVG9rZW46Ym94Y24zUVU4VVVMWFBSQWRFOGhCZHNxckViXzE2NTU0NTk5OTk6MTY1NTQ2MzU5OV9WNA'
---

<div>   
<div style="height: 6px"></div>
                        <p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; text-align: inherit; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;">不少直播间已经能够实现千川的高投产，撬动了自然流量，但还是有不少新号，在投放后直播间依然没流量，没产出，主要还是没跑通以下几个问题：</span></p>
<div data-page-id="doxcnW7kRRTHLylGb9NLhqv3dKf" data-docx-has-block-data="true">
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">1.千川投<a href="https://www.niaogebiji.com/tag/%E7%9F%AD%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91" target="_blank">短视频</a>的优势到底是什么？更容易打爆品？更稳定？</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">2.花同样时间复盘，如何才能快速产出高产能话术脚本</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">3.如何通过预热视频抢占更多自然流量，回流视频如何增强粉丝粘性？</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">目前商家都有在投千川，千川投放有短视频和直播间两种形式，虽然选择直播间画面门槛低，但受主播影响较大，流量不稳定。所以越来越多的商家更偏向短视频加热直播间的创意，内容定向，计划能跑的更稳定。</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"f458fc3f-ed28-40e2-b330-893109aa021c","height":319,"width":1080,"currheight":319,"currwidth":1080,"natrualheight":319,"natrualwidth":1080,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcn3qu8uulxprade8hbdsqreb%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnoskgkaw2skamovoubtcd8d%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcn3qu8uulxprade8hbdsqreb","image_type":"image png","size":91532,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YjgyMTEwYmI3M2ZjODVjYWJhMGY2NGQyYWFjYWI4ZTJfZ1g2S01VSjB4M2p2NTdCS0lYeDdOSFN6Sjh4OGRxem5fVG9rZW46Ym94Y24zUVU4VVVMWFBSQWRFOGhCZHNxckViXzE2NTU0NTk5OTk6MTY1NTQ2MzU5OV9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcn3QU8UULXPRAdE8hBdsqrEb/?mount_node_token=doxcnOsKGkaw2sKaMoVOUBtCD8d&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1080" data-height="319" title="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" alt="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 style="background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; text-align: center; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;">（短视频vs直投）</h4>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">但前提是要有优质的短视频素材创意，那么创意素材用哪些什么形式效果比较好呢？</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">目前发现引流比较成功的直播间，大家更多采用直播切片的形式，直接用直播镜头采集到的画面，视频内容为主播讲解商品，“对话”的形式互动性强，流量更精准。</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">比如下面时段1，直播间流量留存率很高，直播内容互动性很强，就可以在直播中实时下载该时段内的直播高清录像，作为素材二次剪辑，制作切片视频。</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"0f8a8f3c-f8f1-4c14-9ddf-4ea1917e6ba9","height":342,"width":1080,"currheight":342,"currwidth":1080,"natrualheight":342,"natrualwidth":1080,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcn2lybaqpi4b2yckdwgo2cp8%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnkqwucsuimsgg8vkih41bmc%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcn2lybaqpi4b2yckdwgo2cp8","image_type":"image png","size":210341,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NWU2NmZlODgzOWMwYzg3OTRiMWU0N2NjZTM0NTQyOTZfUTdiamxSRW83NkdhRTVPU3ZBODdHWEtBNVBRaUVRNlpfVG9rZW46Ym94Y24yTFlCQXFQSTRiMnlDS0RXR28yQ1A4XzE2NTU0NTk5OTk6MTY1NTQ2MzU5OV9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcn2LYBAqPI4b2yCKDWGo2CP8/?mount_node_token=doxcnKqWUcSUImSGg8vKIH41BMc&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="1080" data-height="342" title="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" alt="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 style="background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; text-align: center; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;">（数据来源：飞瓜智投控制台，数据已获客户授权并脱敏处理）</h4>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">同时，通过根据【千川分时段消耗】可实时查看本场直播在投全量计划的整体消耗以及转化ROI，对比每10分钟的消耗，及时发现能跑出量的计划，定位转化较好的短视频素材。</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"ca54fd84-5c12-4f2d-a3dd-968f9ff6ccbf","height":367,"width":953,"currheight":367,"currwidth":953,"natrualheight":367,"natrualwidth":953,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcn78yfw7rfpniyezaui4pvyc%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnsywuci8wiem2ebgrily11b%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcn78yfw7rfpniyezaui4pvyc","image_type":"image png","size":52930,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDc1ZTJhNWUzNDU2MGE5MDU5MDQwYTFkNGNlZTIzM2NfS0NtWFl3ZWh0dGhmTjh6UDY4N0FZYXhwY2VRbmhTcTBfVG9rZW46Ym94Y243OFlGdzdyRlBOaVlFekFVSTRwVnljXzE2NTU0NTk5OTk6MTY1NTQ2MzU5OV9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcn78YFw7rFPNiYEzAUI4pVyc/?mount_node_token=doxcnSYwucI8WieM2EbgRiLy11b&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="953" data-height="367" title="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" alt="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 style="background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; text-align: center; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;">（数据来源：飞瓜智投投放页，数据已获客户授权并脱敏处理）</h4>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">回忆式复盘很容易发生主播、运营和场控互相扯皮事件，一直解决不了问题。</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">比较好的复盘方式就是通过回看直播录像，结合实时数据变化，从团队配合，流量节奏，商品转化3个维度数据，综合判断“人-货-场”。</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">例如下面的直播间，时段1内，直播间在线人数稳步上升，就可以拖动光标，查看当时的视频画面、弹幕和各维度数据，分析原因，并且还可以下载回放录像，发给主播、投手、运营等单独复盘。</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"e8c60c2e-19b0-40f1-8b1f-e818f982d230","height":384,"width":992,"currheight":384,"currwidth":992,"natrualheight":384,"natrualwidth":992,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcnfegocuoj5hti1cbkypgzkb%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnu8ssiccmk0wyeqgz4nlqpd%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcnfegocuoj5hti1cbkypgzkb","image_type":"image png","size":137589,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTYzYjkzNjM2MjBkMGM1MmYwOWE5Y2VlOTA1NjZmYjRfaDVCT2dKSUprcHJnYzZMblp5WlFWemNOUFJQMkIweW9fVG9rZW46Ym94Y25mRUdPY1VPajVoVEkxY0JreXBnWktiXzE2NTU0NTk5OTk6MTY1NTQ2MzU5OV9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcnfEGOcUOj5hTI1cBkypgZKb/?mount_node_token=doxcnU8SSiCCMK0WYeQGZ4nLQpd&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="992" data-height="384" title="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" alt="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 style="background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; text-align: center; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;">（数据来源：飞瓜智投复盘页，数据已获客户授权并脱敏处理）</h4>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">除了要复盘问题，还需要复盘成功的操作，通过【商品分段复盘度盘】功能，可以对比AB测的转化效果。</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">比如下面的直播间，讲解的都是同一款产品，但是时段1和时段2，主播用了不同的话术，导致了商品有不同的曝光和转化。</p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"95d850ec-ab44-45aa-80e9-08c7d947002c","height":204,"width":882,"currheight":204,"currwidth":882,"natrualheight":204,"natrualwidth":882,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcn7vcckqu1plgwmcnurk61vd%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcncmgmsauqe6gs2ryfbsdeqf%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcn7vcckqu1plgwmcnurk61vd","image_type":"image png","size":51005,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzkxZWM1NzcwOGVlZDQxMjk2Mjc4NGE4MGFiNTVkODJfS0gyUDlYNFdWVzVDa053ckFpSE9ua0JDSW92ZnhGelJfVG9rZW46Ym94Y243VkNjS3F1MVBsR1dtQ05VUks2MVZkXzE2NTU0NTk5OTk6MTY1NTQ2MzU5OV9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcn7VCcKqu1PlGWmCNURK61Vd/?mount_node_token=doxcnCMGmsAuQe6gS2RYfbsdeQf&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="882" data-height="204" title="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" alt="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"5f664259-40e8-4a97-b4dd-8404f8c807a0","height":370,"width":938,"currheight":370,"currwidth":938,"natrualheight":370,"natrualwidth":938,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcnjuazyu6lzddhj6dgck3kkf%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnoqieqe28844yqya5mqglic%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcnjuazyu6lzddhj6dgck3kkf","image_type":"image png","size":170560,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZWY3MTAxYTRiMDAwN2Y5ZmIxNDI5NzM3YjAwNGVlNTJfTVZuQU1JZlIwMUdWYURPdTJ3MlhkMUl5NVFqZkF6a0pfVG9rZW46Ym94Y25qdWFaWXU2THpEREhqNkRnY0sza2tmXzE2NTU0NTk5OTk6MTY1NTQ2MzU5OV9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcnjuaZYu6LzDDHj6DgcK3kkf/?mount_node_token=doxcnOqieQe28844yqYA5mqgLIc&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="938" data-height="370" title="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" alt="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="&#123;" items":[&#123;"uuid":"f6133a8b-c957-42d8-8668-f8d0a284eab7","height":261,"width":640,"currheight":261,"currwidth":640,"natrualheight":261,"natrualwidth":640,"pluginname":"imageupload","scale":1,"src":"https%3a%2f%2finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2fspace%2fapi%2fbox%2fstream%2fdownload%2fall%2fboxcnlwsphaxi09dkmkvj4ydrqc%2f%3fmount_node_token%3ddoxcnaksc6a2gm44ad44kaxbuka%26mount_point%3ddocx_image","file_token":"boxcnlwsphaxi09dkmkvj4ydrqc","image_type":"image png","size":123697,"comments":[]&#125;]&#125;"><img style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" src="https://guojipro.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YWJkNjc5MWU5MDBkODJkNWNlM2MxOTRmYzI3OGQ1NDJfVXlSakpOZ3RSUXZuSGM4NFFsT2hSdHBHRFJQOGh3OE9fVG9rZW46Ym94Y25MV1NwSEF4STA5ZGtNa1ZqNHlEUlFjXzE2NTU0NTk5OTk6MTY1NTQ2MzU5OV9WNA" data-single-block="true" data-snapshot="" data-suite="" data-src="https://internal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/all/boxcnLWSpHAxI09dkMkVj4yDRQc/?mount_node_token=doxcnaKSC6a2gm44AD44KAxBUKA&mount_point=docx_image" data-width="640" data-height="261" title="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" alt="抖音直播巨量千川还能这么投？一招打破放量瓶颈！" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h4 style="background-image: none; font-size: 14px; color: #818386; text-align: center; font-weight: 300; line-height: 30px; margin: 25px 0px;">（数据来源：飞瓜智投复盘页，数据已获客户授权并脱敏处理）</h4>
<p style="background-image: none; font-size: 16px; color: #000000; text-align: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 25px 0px 20px;">同时可以结合直播录像，回放这两段商品讲解视频，找到造成转化率不同的原因，对高转化时段的讲解话术和节奏特点及时复盘总结，建立专属的引导话术，在之后的直播中复用。</p>
</div>                        <div style="height: 1px"></div>
                      
</div>
